languages.text: "Сегодня — да. Но я не могу обещать вечно оставаться твоей спутницей. Так много зла, скрытого и явного, так много скверны и мерзости прячется за каждым углом! Я жажду смести его, искоренить. Везде, где найду, в любое время, любой ценой". {n}Глаза Ардженты опасно горят.{/n} "Тебя обременяет слишком много мелочных забот, Вольный Торговец. Моя дорога — прямее и неумолимее".

traits.locale_text: "Сегодня — да. Но я не могу обещать вечно оставаться твоей спутницей. Так много зла, скрытого и явного, так много скверны и мерзости прячется за каждым углом! Я жажду смести его, искоренить. Везде, где найду, в любое время, любой ценой". {n}Глаза Ардженты опасно горят.{/n} "Тебя обременяет слишком много мелочных забот, Вольный Торговец. Моя дорога — прямее и неумолимее".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня — да. Но я не могу обещать вечно оставаться твоей спутницей. Так много зла, скрытого и явного, так много скверны и мерзости прячется за каждым углом! Я жажду смести его, искоренить. Везде, где найду, в любое время, любой ценой". {n}Глаза Ардженты опасно горят.{/n} "Тебя обременяет слишком много мелочных забот, Вольный Торговец. Моя дорога — прямее и неумолимее".

Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

traits.locale_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Hoy sí. Pero no puedo comprometerme a permanecer siempre a su lado. ¡Hay demasiada maldad oculta y manifiesta, demasiada corrupción y vileza al acecho tras cada esquina! Anhelo purgarla en su totalidad, erradicarla dondequiera que la encuentre, sea como sea, sin importar el precio». {n}Un fuego amenazador arde en los ojos de Argenta.{/n} «Usted carga con el peso de muchas trivialidades, Comerciante Independiente. Mi cometido, por otro lado, me lleva por un sendero recto que conduce inexorablemente a un único objetivo».
languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy sí. Pero no puedo comprometerme a permanecer siempre a su lado. ¡Hay demasiada maldad oculta y manifiesta, demasiada corrupción y vileza al acecho tras cada esquina! Anhelo purgarla en su totalidad, erradicarla dondequiera que la encuentre, sea como sea, sin importar el precio». {n}Un fuego amenazador arde en los ojos de Argenta.{/n} «Usted carga con el peso de muchas trivialidades, Comerciante Independiente. Mi cometido, por otro lado, me lleva por un sendero recto que conduce inexorablemente a un único objetivo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「今はそのつもりだが、常に側にいるという約束はできない。この世界にはいたるところに邪悪が姿を現し、腐敗と悪意にまみれている！ 私はそれらを一掃し、排除したい。いつ、どこで見つけようと、どのような代償を払わなければならないとしてもだ」{n}アルジェンタの目は危機を感じるほどに燃えている。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、あなたは些細な問題事を抱えすぎている。一方で私の道は一直線であり、ひとつの目標へと力強くつながっているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

traits.locale_text: 「今はそのつもりだが、常に側にいるという約束はできない。この世界にはいたるところに邪悪が姿を現し、腐敗と悪意にまみれている！ 私はそれらを一掃し、排除したい。いつ、どこで見つけようと、どのような代償を払わなければならないとしてもだ」{n}アルジェンタの目は危機を感じるほどに燃えている。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、あなたは些細な問題事を抱えすぎている。一方で私の道は一直線であり、ひとつの目標へと力強くつながっているのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我此刻愿意追随你，但不能保证永远在你身边。每个角落都潜伏着或隐或现的邪恶，如此之多的腐化与卑劣！我多么渴望把它们连根拔起，一个不留！无论在何时何地，无论要付出怎样的代价。”{n}阿洁塔的双眼闪烁着危险的烈焰。{/n}“你背负了太多琐碎的烦恼，行商浪人。而我的道路则是一条直线，只会势不可挡，通向唯一的终点。”
languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

traits.locale_text: “我此刻愿意追随你，但不能保证永远在你身边。每个角落都潜伏着或隐或现的邪恶，如此之多的腐化与卑劣！我多么渴望把它们一个不留，连根拔起！无论在何时何地，无论要付出怎样的代价。”{n}阿洁塔的双眼闪烁着危险的烈焰。{/n}“你背负了太多琐碎的烦恼，行商浪人。而我的道路则是一条直线，只会势不可挡，通向唯一的终点。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Pour le moment, oui, mais je ne peux pas vous promettre que je serai toujours à vos côtés. Le mal, caché ou manifeste, la corruption et la bassesse rôdent dans chaque recoin ! J'aspire à les balayer, à les éradiquer systématiquement et à n'importe quel prix partout où je les débusque, {n}déclare-t-elle, une lueur dangereuse dans ses yeux ardents.{/n} Trop de tâches insignifiantes vous encombrent, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, alors que ma route est une ligne droite qui mène inexorablement vers un but unique. »
languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

traits.locale_text: « Pour le moment, oui, mais je ne peux pas vous promettre que je serai toujours à vos côtés. Le mal, caché ou manifeste, la corruption et la bassesse rôdent dans chaque recoin ! J'aspire à les balayer, à les éradiquer systématiquement et à n'importe quel prix partout où je les débusque, {n}déclare-t-elle, une lueur dangereuse dans ses yeux ardents.{/n} Trop de tâches insignifiantes vous encombrent, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, alors que ma route est une ligne droite qui mène inexorablement vers un but unique. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Heute schon. Doch ich kann nicht versprechen, dass ich immer an Eurer Seite stehen werde. An allen Ecken lauert so viel Böses, verborgen und ganz offen, so viel Korruption, so viel Schändlichkeit! Ich sehne mich danach, alles wegzufegen, alles auszulöschen — wo ich es auch finde, wann ich es auch finde, was es mich auch kostet." {n}Argentas Augen brennen gefährlich.{/n} "Ihr seid mit zu vielen trivialen Sorgen belastet, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Während meine Straße eine gerade Linie ist, die unweigerlich zu einem einzigen Ziel führt."
languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

Während meine Straße eine gerade Linie ist, die unweigerlich zu einem einzigen Ziel führt."

languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

languages.text: "Bugünlük evet. Ama yarınlarda yanında olacağıma söz veremem. Her köşe bucakta o kadar çok kötülük, yozluk ve pislik saklanıyor ki! Hepsini defedip köklerini kurutacağım. Nerede, ne vakit, ne pahasına olursa olsun." {n}Argenta'nın gözlerinde yanan ateş, harlandıkça harlanıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, önemsiz meselelerle uğraşıp duruyorsun. Benim yolumsa tek bir hedefe doğrudan gidiyor."
languages.original_text: "Today I do. But I cannot promise to always be at your side. There is so much evil, hidden and overt, so much corruption and vileness lurking in every corner! I yearn to sweep all of it away, to eradicate it — wherever I find it, whenever I find it, no matter the cost." {n}Argenta's eyes burn dangerously.{/n} "You are burdened with too many trivial cares, Rogue Trader. Whereas my road is a straight line that leads inexorably to a single goal."

traits.locale_text: "Bugünlük evet. Ama yarınlarda yanında olacağıma söz veremem. Her köşede saklanan onca kötülük, yozluk ve pislik var ki! Hepsini defedip köklerini kurutacağım. Nerede, ne vakit, ne pahasına olursa olsun."" {n}Argenta'nın gözlerinde yanan ateş harlandıkça harlanıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, önemsiz meselelerle uğraşıp duruyorsun. Benim yolumsa tek bir hedefe doğrudan gidiyor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
